entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
